nodes.text: Redhill was the capital city of a province of the same name on the Chiss Ascendancy planet Celwis. Xodlak family Councilor Lakuviv managed the family's affairs on a provincial scale from his White Judgment Seat in Redhill Hall in Redhill.
Redhill was located across the planet from Brickwalk, where Patriel Xodlak'oo'nifis governed the Xodlak on the planet.
